title: @Riot: Your "mystery skins" are TOTALLY not rigged in any way!
body:
I got the skin Pool Party Lee Sin, from my friend PoolParty LeeSin

(best mystery skin I've ever received so far)

http://i.imgur.com/AFS59aC.jpg

replies.body:
wait, did they already release the pool party skins?

edit: what I meant was the mystery skins from the pool party week, didn't even make the connection in my head there lol

I think my friend used something called, "lol voice over changer". If you search that in Google it should be the very first link that will lead you to the right website.

Ancient Korean Secret:)
YOu can change the language settings at the launch screen when you start up league

I got divine soraka from a skin boost with a random group of 5 from one of the pool party chats. We go on a 7 win streak (of 7 games played together) and after the last game one of them gave mystery skins to everyone on our team. I got divine soraka. Coincidence? Maybe.
I gave Laughing Fish an Infernal Nasus. He doesn't know it yet :3
http://25.media.tumblr.com/b6a47cd2196f1e7033e3ea656a0db29b/tumblr_n3g341EtKx1r5zq6ao3_r1_250.gif

POO ^^
Shit flung over your head.

Me and a friend traded Mystery skins. He got Nunu Bot, i got Alien Invader Heimerdinger.
It was a good weekend.

I sent my brother 3 Mystery Gift Skins. He got 2 {{champion:18}} skins and Officer {{champion:254}} . He literally only owns like 4 champions. 2 Tristana skins in a row...

(I got Winter Wonder Orianna though from him...)
I only have ever gotten one mystery skin... Red Baron Corki.

The only Mystery skin I ever got was from Riot at the end of S4;

It was Riot {{champion:10}} ..
i think i've seen you before but i cant remember......

> [{quoted}](name=insaiyanbacca,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=fEnfoAT8,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-06-22T17:05:15.000+0000)
>
> i think i've seen you before but i cant remember......

Maybe in General Discussion? I have the FEK (Forum Enhancer Kit) thread pinned at the very top of of the Board.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/cg2zx6Ey-fek-30-preview

http://i.imgur.com/pUEFenW.png[/img]
is it really a mystery gift tho? He seems to know it's gonna be a lee skin. Maybe that was the only skin you had left to claim for Lee...

> [{quoted}](name=The Loveless,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=fEnfoAT8,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-06-22T17:41:26.979+0000)
>
> is it really a mystery gift tho? He seems to know it's gonna be a lee skin. Maybe that was the only skin you had left to claim for Lee...

I only owned two Lee Sin skins before receiving that one. Also for mystery skins it could have been for any champion I owned, and I own all but three of them. The message does seem like he knew he was going to gift Pool Party Lee Sin, but it was literally the most extreme luckest of luck

http://i.imgur.com/mwZZ7d0.jpg[/img]

The first time I tried out mystery skins. I bought Poppy and Annie, thinking I may get lucky. The two skins I got where Panda Annie and Blacksmith Poppy. Just recently I got another two hoping for a Ryze skin. I got Zombie Ryze and Dark Crystal...

my friend gifted me battlecast skarner, i gifted him hillbilly gragas haha. mystery gifts like me :)
another time i gifted a different friend for his birthday and he got infernal nasus (someone else was going to buy him that too )
The only mystery skin I've gotten is from riot and it was dreadnight nasus
